rooms.name: Front Porch
rooms.description: A creaky wooden porch with a rocking chair. The door behind you is locked, but a path leads into the yard.

rooms.name: Overgrown Yard
rooms.description: Tall grass brushes your legs. An old shed leans to one side, and a trail disappears into the trees.

rooms.name: Old Shed
rooms.description: Dusty tools hang from the walls. Something scratches at the inside of the door.

rooms.name: Forest Trail
rooms.description: A narrow trail winds between dark trees. The air is cold and still.

rooms.name: Quiet Clearing
rooms.description: A small clearing with a circle of stones. The ground looks disturbed here.
